author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:

Replaced boost library use for C++ STL alternatives. All the code should have similar behavior. 

Notes:

- std::unordered_set demands a hasher class(TriedPattern::HashFunction)  for custom classes as keys. 

- hash_combine is the same implementation as in boost::hash_combine.


#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

@vgvassilev @davidlange6
title: Removed boost dependency in RecoLocalMuon/DTSegment
